name: Sonic Dash+
summary:
Sonic Dash+ is the advanced edition of Sonic the Hedgehog’s first endless runner, Sonic Dash, that was originally released in 2013.

Sonic Dash+ released for Apple Arcade in 2022 . This updated version do not have microtransactions or ads present in the original game.
